snippet.title: Baby Steps - Official Announcement Trailer | Devolver Digital Showcase 2023
snippet.description:
Meet Nate in this fun announcement trailer for Baby Steps, an upcoming literal walking simulator--featuring physics-based gameplay--from the minds behind Ape Out and Getting Over It. In Baby Steps, you’ll be introduced to Nate, an unemployed failson with nothing going for him, until one day he discovers a power he never knew he had… putting one foot in front of the other. Explore a world shrouded in mist, one step at a time. Baby Steps will be available on PC and PlayStation 5 in 2024.

#IGN #SummerOfGaming
